cause.description:
There is this boy who was devastated with such a last name as fudge and it hurts us all to see the boy suffer. Poor Chad, because of his last name (Fudge) is subject of ridicule. we hope to get some money to give to chad so he can buy himself a friend or two
1. Chad needs friends
2. Beyond popular beleif Chad isnt gay
3. Who cares if he has bad hair
4. He plays bass. may not be as good as any other instrument but its chad so we will be proud
5. And Chad this is a joke we love you(make sure he thinks this)
6. If they made a statue of chad they would make it out of cheese only cause cheese isnt fudge creating irony
7. Chad Fudge is another word you can use in place of the words "a silly goose" hense when we see chad we say hi Chad Fudge
8. He Is a JC (inside joke)
9. I once hugged Chad and he took a cheap feel of my bum
10. He Is Chad Effing Fudge
11. haha...................^^ Fudge
12. About #2 its wrong Chad is gay
cause.name: Get Chad Some Friends
